channel.title: backtracking on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in backtracking on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-40. Combination Sum II
item.description: Given a collection of candidate numbers (candidates) and a target number (target), find all unique combinations in candidates where the candidate numbers sum to target.

item.title: Leetcode-77. Combinations
item.description: Given two integers n and k, return all possible combinations of k numbers chosen from the range [1, n].

item.title: Leetcode-39. Combination Sum
item.description: Given an array of distinct integers candidates and a target integer target, return a list of all unique combinations of candidates where the chosen numbers sum to target.
